findings.title: #1.Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source (like OpenZeppelin etc.)
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: #2.A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is „“^0.6.2““.

findings.title: #3.Missing Zero Address Validation (missing-zero-check)
findings.description: Check that the address is not zero
